vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_18.sol#7-17):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_18.sol#13)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lockedAccounts (patch_18.sol#16)
